datamap-doc-page-does-not-exist: ''Documentation for this data page may be created at [[$1]]''
datamap-error-validation-no-display: Group "$1" has no icon or color specified.
datamap-error-validation-ambiguous-displ: Group "$1" cannot have its markers configured to have both an icon and a color.
datamap-error-render-unsupported-display: Display mode $1 has been reported for a marker, but support is missing for it. This is a bug in the extension's code.
datamap-error-pf-page-does-not-exist: Data map page "[[$1]]" does not exist.
datamap-error-pf-page-invalid-content-mo: Content model of page "[[$1]]" is not datamap.
datamap-javascript-required: Interactive data maps require JavaScript to be enabled.
